segments.text: I'm observing the children in the kitchen, and they're up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a two-step stool, precariously balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet labeled 'COOKIE JAR'.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see his hand already in the jar, pulling out cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, hand outstretched, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool's legs are splayed, and it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am quite fearful that he might tumble backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way they're so focused on their secret operation is almost amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by their audacity, given the adult is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a clear act of mischief, and I can't help but feel a little disgusted by their sneakiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so concentrated on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem unaware of the danger, too.
segments.speaker: PAR
